attributes.action: Initiate the facility to have regular blood pressure checks in every work place
attributes.additional_details: As we call this condition the silent killer we could save many lives via a relatively inexpensive preventive procedure involving trained volunteer members of staff.
attributes.background: I am a Government and politics A level tutor in a sixth form College, who has recently suffered a stroke, probably caused by high BP, and I had no idea and no prior warning.
